conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
For an action-packed movie experience, I recommend 'WarGames' (1983). This classic film combines elements of science fiction and action as a young man gets caught up in a military computer game gone haywire.

Alternatively, if you're looking for a more recent adrenaline-fueled film, 'Saw' (2004) would be a good choice. This psychological horror movie presents a deadly game where players are forced to confront their deepest fears and secrets.
